intro.heading: כותרת מדהים
intro.description: צור באופן מיידי עשרות כותרות מושכות תשומת לב ומוצצות כסף שעוצרות אנשים בעקבותיהם! השתמש בהם בכל מקום!

brands.alt: 3. השתמש בכותרות כדי להשיג יותר מכירות ולתפוס יותר מנויים!

about.title: Rest assured that your investment will prove to be worth it.
about.description: As a developer who values integrity and accountability, I deliver results that speak for themselves. With expertise in a variety of technologies, I ensure that every project meets high standards.  Every investment will prove its worth.  Hope to connect from you.  - Mykhailo Ananiev -

details.title: Web development for Marketing Agency Startup
details.description:
- Analyzing the Figma design and understanding its components, layout, and functionality.
-Converting the design into code, which involves coding HTML tags and using CSS to style the page. Ensuring that the HTML code is responsive, meaning that it adapts to different screen sizes and devices.
- Thoroughly testing the HTML code to ensure that it functions correctly and looks as expected on different browsers and devices.
- Delivering the final HTML code, which can be deployed to a web server and accessed by users.

details.title: The Develop Duplicated Fortnite Website.
details.description:
- Integrate fortnite API
- Customize map matched with season of Fortnite Platform
- Styling data type as object to get and bind data to frontne part.

details.title: Figma into Wordpress
details.description:
- experience with responsive design and development, including cross-browser compatibility and accessibility best practices.
- Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe Creative Suite.
- Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and the ability to create wireframes and mockups that effectively communicate design concepts and user flows.

allProjects.title: Dashboard Design
allProjects.subTitle: Build Front-end with React and Next.js

details.title: Build Front-end with React and Next.js
details.description:
Build the front-end with React and Next.js.
- I have helped clients migrate their sites to WordPress from other platforms, such as Squarespace and Wix, and have provided ongoing maintenance and support to ensure their sites are always up-to-date and secure.
- My knowledge of responsive design and accessibility best practices has enabled me to build WordPress sites that are optimized for all devices and users, regardless of their abilities.

details.title: Build with React and Redux
details.description:
Experience with React.js and its ecosystem, including React Router.
- Redux or Context API, and popular libraries like Axios or Fetch.
- Familiarity with CSS pre-processors like Sass or Less, or styling libraries like Material UI or Bootstrap.
- Ability to create responsive layouts using CSS and HTML.
- Knowledge of web development tools and workflows, including Node.js, Git, and Webpack.
- Familiarity with deploying web applications to servers using tools like Heroku or Netlify.

details.title: Build Back-end with ExpressJS
details.description:
- Successfully integrated cloud services for RIA support and product fulfillment application, multilingual content services, and a pluggable payment provider architecture for pre-authorization credit card payments.
- Optimized SQL queries for the heavy-load parts of the system, which improved website responsiveness and reduced the database costs by 20%.
- Redeveloped existing systems to support custom account management, content, and mobile business verticals.

details.title: Build whole project with Anguar & Laravel
details.description:
Deep understanding in Angular and Ngrx.
- Associate Angular and Laravel with MongoDB and perform testing like Unit Test.
- I resolved by configuring CORS on the Laravel API because of Angular runs on the client-side and Laravel runs on the server-side, so there may be issues with CORS when trying to make requests from Angular to a Laravel API

details.title: Animation with original CSS and JavaScript
details.description:
-I have made animation with CSS and JavaScript without any libraries for animation.
- I have fixed the issues in integration into WordPress and maintain the correct run.
- Through this project I have deep understanding of animation and enhanced my skills.

details.title: Create Keycloak theme and integration with React
details.description:
- I have created keycloak theme with Java and JavaScript.
- I have integrated with React and maintained to run correctly.
- Through this project, I have known about keycloak and springboot and have knowledge of Java and related frameworks.

details.title: Shopify
details.description:
- I am proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Liquid, which has enabled me to build responsive and user-friendly Shopify sites that are optimized for performance.
- I have implemented various Shopify plugins and integrations, such as Shopify Payments, Mailchimp, and Facebook Pixel, to help clients streamline their e-commerce operations and grow their businesses.
- I have helped clients migrate their online stores to Shopify from other platforms, such as WooCommerce and Magento, and have provided ongoing maintenance and support to ensure their stores are always up-to-date and secure.

allExperience.companyDescription: Experienced in MERN stack, WordPress, and Shopify, I develop custom web solutions for diverse clients. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, I create visually appealing and functional websites. I optimize SEO to boost site visibility and rankings. Specializing in user-friendly mobile apps, I integrate seamless payment systems and APIs, particularly on Google Cloud. Rigorous testing ensures efficient performance, and my problem-solving skills deliver fast results, exceeding expectations.

I am a dedicated Senior Software Developer with a focus on revolutionizing the financial technology landscape through expertise in trading systems and real-time data streaming. My work with a leading financial technology company has been instrumental in enhancing their technological infrastructure, enabling them to stay ahead in a dynamic market.

As a seasoned Full Stack Developer, I have had the privilege of contributing to the success of a leading global e-commerce platform by playing a pivotal role in the development and optimization of both frontend interfaces and backend systems.

allTestimonial.reviewText: It was a pleasure working with Mykhailo. He is a very skilled programmer and it shows in his code and speed in delivery. Would definitely work with again. Thank you Mykhailo!!
Perfect job. Amazing knowledge and communications.        Definitely I recommend Mykhailo.

Mykhailos is a reliable and organized developer. They have shown excellent project management skills, consistently meeting project deadlines and efficiently coordinating tasks with the team. Their contributions have greatly contributed to our project's success, from initial planning to the final deployment.

sectionHeading.title: הגדל את המכירות עם כותרות קליטות!
sectionHeading.subTitle: מלא את הטופס, לחץ על כפתור לבנות וראה את המכירות שלך מזנקות עם כותרות שובות לב שמושכות יותר מנויים!
